import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useAuth}from'../../contexts/AuthContext';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{CalendarIcon,TicketIcon,FilmIcon,CurrencyRupeeIcon,ChevronRightIcon,PlayIcon}from'@heroicons/react/24/outline';import bookingService from'../../services/bookingService';import AnimatedCounter from'../../components/common/AnimatedCounter';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UserDashboard=()=>{const{user}=useAuth();const navigate=useNavigate();const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[userStats,setUserStats]=useState({totalBookings:0,upcomingShows:0,totalSpent:0,favoriteGenres:[]});useEffect(()=>{const loadData=()=>{try{// Load booking data from localStorage
const userBookings=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('userBookings')||'[]');const dashboardStats=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('userDashboardStats')||'{}');console.log('UserDashboard - Loaded data:',{userBookings,dashboardStats});// Use pre-calculated stats if available, otherwise calculate from bookings
let totalBookings,upcomingShows,totalSpent;if(dashboardStats.totalBookings!==undefined){// Use pre-calculated stats from BookMovie component
totalBookings=dashboardStats.totalBookings;upcomingShows=dashboardStats.upcomingShows||0;totalSpent=dashboardStats.totalSpent||0;}else{// Calculate stats from userBookings if no pre-calculated stats exist
const now=new Date();const upcoming=userBookings.filter(booking=>{const showDate=new Date(booking.date+' '+booking.showTime);return showDate>now;}).length;totalBookings=userBookings.length;upcomingShows=upcoming;totalSpent=userBookings.reduce((sum,booking)=>{return sum+(booking.totalAmount||0);},0);}// Extract favorite genres from bookings
const genreCount={};userBookings.forEach(booking=>{const genre=booking.movieTitle||'Unknown';genreCount[genre]=(genreCount[genre]||0)+1;});const favoriteGenres=Object.entries(genreCount).sort((_ref,_ref2)=>{let[,a]=_ref;let[,b]=_ref2;return b-a;}).slice(0,3).map(_ref3=>{let[genre]=_ref3;return genre;});const finalStats={totalBookings:totalBookings,upcomingShows:upcomingShows,totalSpent:totalSpent,favoriteGenres:favoriteGenres.length>0?favoriteGenres:['Action','Drama','Comedy']};console.log('UserDashboard - Setting stats:',finalStats);setUserStats(finalStats);}catch(err){console.error('Error loading dashboard data:',err);// Fallback to demo data
setUserStats({totalBookings:0,upcomingShows:0,totalSpent:0,favoriteGenres:['Action','Drama','Comedy']});}setLoading(false);};loadData();// Listen for storage changes to update stats in real-time
const handleStorageChange=e=>{console.log('UserDashboard - Storage change detected:',e.key,e.newValue);if(e.key==='userBookings'||e.key==='userDashboardStats'){console.log('UserDashboard - Reloading data due to storage change');loadData();}};// Listen for focus events to refresh data when user comes back to dashboard
const handleFocus=()=>{loadData();};window.addEventListener('storage',handleStorageChange);window.addEventListener('focus',handleFocus);// Listen for custom booking updates (same-tab)
